item.title: Spark Installation on Windows
item.description: Intro Today I will discuss how to install Apache Spark onto a Windows machine. I have just walked through the process a second time at work due to a laptop swap and it takes me some time to remember all the steps to get the install right, so I thought I would document the process. Step #1: Download and Installation Install Spark First you will need to download Spark, which comes with the package for SparkR.
